popup_alert_sync_already_active.message: Synchronization is in progress on another device, please wait... Database will be automatically unlocked in 5 min.

popup_conflict_select_version.message: Please select the version that should be retained

popup_conflict_use_this_choice.message: Use this choise for all conflicts of this sync

popup_warning_unsorted.message:
Important, if you sync bookmarks between FireFox and Chrome!
FireFox folder "Unsorted" won't be synced by Chrome browser, but it will be synced by EverSync to FireFox.

options_restore_message_sent.message: Restore instructions has been sent to your email

options_error_password_too_short.message: Password is too short( must be not less than 8 symbols )

options_confirm_desc.message: Check your e-mail to confirm registration

confirm_change_password_desc.message: Change password confirm key has been sent to your E-Mail

options_merge_desc.message: Data from Server and Computer will be merged (Note: Server has higher priority).

options_overwrite_desc.message: Copy data from your Computer to Server

options_download_desc.message: Copy data from Server to your Computer

options_init_sync_desc.message: Before start syncing you have to select one of the following actions

options_sync_bookmarks_quota.message: There're no limits on syncing bookmarks but you can use Merge / Download Bookmarks features 4 times a day due Google Api Restrictions.

options_bookmarks_backup_first_line.message: Just make sure that your bookmarks won't be lost, we automatically made the backup of all your bookmarks.

options_bookmarks_backup_second_line.message: All your bookmarks saved on your computer.

options_sd_backup_first_line.message: Just to make sure that your dials won't be lost, we automatically made the backup of all your dials.

options_sd_backup_second_line.message: All your dials saved on your computer.

options_ds_chromsync_l1.message: If your Chrome Sync is enabled, please read it:

options_ds_chromsync_l2.message: In order to sync bookmarks with our extension you need to disable "Bookmarks" sync in Chrome Browser.

options_ds_chromsync_l3.message: Click "Open Chrome Settings." > "Sign In" section click "Advanced Settings" > Uncheck "Bookmarks".

options_ds_chromsync_confirm_text.message: I confirm that bookmarks are disabled.

options_why_use_web_ui.message: Why do I need Web Access?

options_backup_warning_message.message: Important! These backups are stored in EverSync local database. If you delete this extension, this database will be also deleted! Use online access and online backups.

options_unlimsync_old_chrome_text_1.message: We did improvements and now you don't need to restart browser when sync a lot of bookmarks. In Order to Sync bookmarks you need to have Chrome Browser 38+ or later. Your current Chrome version doesn't support sync of large amount of bookmarks(more than 500).

options_unlimsync_old_chrome_text_2.message: in your tab and update Chrome. Thanks.

dlg_sync_quota_exceed_text.message: You can use Merge / Download Bookmarks features 4 times a day due Google Api Restrictions.

dlg_bookmarks_confirm_overwrite_server_d.message: Are you sure you want to overwrite server data?

dlg_speeddial_confirm_overwrite_server_d.message: Are you sure you want to overwrite server data?

dlg_sync_progress_bottom_text.message: This step usually takes 10 to 40 seconds. Please be patient...

dlg_confirm_abort_sync_text.message: Do you really want to abort current sync process?

dlg_alert_sync_failed_chrome_quota_excee.message: Browser quota exceed. Please, try again later.

dlg_alert_warning_full_access_text.message:
Sync addon requires permission which is called "Access to all data on computer"
It doesn't mean that our addon will access to all your files!
We need access only to one bookmark file in Chrome environment.
As soon as you get permission to overwrite file(s), Chrome calls it "Full access".
Please, do not get paranoid with that! Chrome Webstore manually reviews such addons!!!

dlg_alert_wrong_login_password_text.message: Incorrect username or password. Please, Sign In again.

dlg_sync_manual_sync_in_process.message: Note: Due to Google Chrome Copy/Write Limits we have to manually overwrite your bookmarks file. Your data won't be lost.

dlg_sync_manual_sync_in_process_msg2.message: restart Chrome Browser when sync is finished.

dlg_sync_manual_sync_in_process_msg3.message: If you won't restart it and create new bookmarks, they will be lost when you restart your browser.

dlg_sync_manual_sync_success.message: Important! Your bookmarks file was overwritten! To apply changes and finish Sync you have to restart your Chrome Browser.

dlg_sync_in_progress_before_close.message: Synchronization in progress... Do you really want to close this page?

confirm_remove_account_text.message: Do you really want to remove your sync account with all data?

alert_window_large_sync_text.message: Google API policy doesn't allow to make more than 100 actions in hour. You need to sync bookmarks manually.

alert_window_must_restart_after_large_sy.message: Important! You must restart browser to finish sync!

alert_window_sync_timeout_after_action_t.message: Ops, Sync will be available in 10 seconds...

alert_window_sync_timeout_after_sync_tex.message: Ops, You can sync only once every 10 seconds...

alert_window_action_after_plugin_sync_2.message: All changes will be overwritten after restart.

alert_window_action_after_plugin_sync_3.message: Please, restart browser and than make new changes with your bookmarks!

alert_window_remove_unsorted_folder_text.message: Unsorted is system folder you cannot move it

alert_window_need_sync_software_title.message: You have to install additional software to continue

alert_window_need_sync_software_text.message: Due to New Chrome limitation you have to install EverSync for your desktop.

confirm_really_restore_bookmarks_text.message: This action will ovewrite your current bookmarks set, continue?

confirm_really_restore_sd_text.message: This action will ovewrite your current groups and dials, continue?

sd_download_message.message:
We moved synchronization of Speed Dials into FVD Speed Dial extension.
You need to use one of the latest versions FVD Speed Dial with 3D mode.

sd_backups_moved.message: Speed Dial Backups moved to FVD Speed Dial settings

backups_message.message: We recommend using server backups because they are less likely to be erased or corrupted than local backups. Future versions of EverSync will use server backups exclusively.

options_why_use_webui.message:
You can always sync and back up to EverHelper using the EverSync and FVD Speed Dial add-ons.

However, some features are available only through the EverHelper web interface:

  • Creating additional backups
  • Creating private bookmarks and dials
  • Importing bookmarks from HTML files
  • Copying bookmarks into and from FVD Speed Dial

Plus, the web interface gives you the access to your bookmarks from absolutely any browser, even one without our apps installed!
